item.description:
UPDATE 10/8/09: Chunky's has posted the time of the first showing at 7:15pm, it is Chunky's suggestion to arrive 1 hour prior to showing to have a better chance at a seat. Please note we have changed the time of this meetup to 6:00pm, we will not wait past 6:15pm to get a seat.

See you at the movies


Let's go out to Chunky's in Haverhill for few laughs and a good movie.

This movie is due to release on 10/9, the movie time has not been posted so we will update the meetin time once the release is made.

The movie review:

Four couples settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on their marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.

Rated R.

For more information on Chunky's theatre: http://www.chunkys.co...
item.name: Chunkys Theatre-Couples retreat
